text: Hey team – I’m wondering if any HubSpot employees can get in touch with me. I’m looking to connect with somebody on the data side after seeing <https://www.HubSpot.com/covid-data?category=total&topic=conversations&subTopic=&drilldown=null|this nifty dashboard>. And and all help is much appreciated!

has anyone used <http://greenhouse.io|greenhouse.io> API with HubSpot? there’s no integration in the marketplace, but we’ll be using it in an upcoming build and are looking for any tips from anyone else who has.
